name: Core API Release 36.5.0
description: We have rolled out another version of the Core APIs, which brings you some new features, an improvement, and a bug fix.

ADDED.text: Three new APIs, MFA Validate Authenticator Code, MFA Verify Authenticator Code, and MFA Step-Up Authentication by Authenticator Code, have been added.
In the mandatory verification workflow, the prevention of verification emails is now possible.

Introduced new error messages for the error codes 1098, 1099, 1102, 1250, and 1279 for Multi-Factor Authentication in the Authenticator flow. You can refer to the following documentation for the description of these error messages

IMPROVED.text: The Auth Verify Email by OTP API now includes a new UID parameter. This addition allows for the sending of a verification email to the user, facilitating the verification of the Raas user profile based on either the email address or UID field associated with the social profile.

FIXED.text: Blocked accounts will no longer be able to request One Time Password (OTP).
